Package com.what2see.service.tour.search

Class TourSearchStrategyAdministrator

java.lang.Object
com.what2see.service.tour.search.TourSearchStrategyAdministrator
All Implemented Interfaces:
TourSearchStrategy
public class TourSearchStrategyAdministrator extends Object implements TourSearchStrategy
Implementation of the Strategy design pattern.
This class represents a concrete strategy for searching tours that is suitable for Administrators.
This strategy can look for public and privatee tours and sort them by descending order based on the following criteria (order of precedence):
  1. reports count
  2. reviews count
  3. marked count

    • executeSearch

      public List<Tour> executeSearch(TourRepository repository, User requesting, City city, Theme theme, String approxDuration, List<Tag> tags)
      Searches tours based on the given parameters independently of their visibility.
      Specified by:
      executeSearch in interface TourSearchStrategy
      Parameters:
      repository - tour repository (should be autowired in the client class)
      requesting - administrator that is requesting the search
      city - city filter (optional)
      theme - theme filter (optional)
      approxDuration - maximum duration filter (optional)
      tags - tags filter (optional)
      Returns:
      list of tours that match the given criteria

    • executeSort

      public List<Tour> executeSort(List<Tour> toSort, TourRepository repository, User requesting, City city, Theme theme, String approxDuration, List<Tag> tags)
      Sorts the given list of tours by descending order based on the following criteria (order of precedence):
      1. reports count
      2. reviews count
      3. marked count
      Specified by:
      executeSort in interface TourSearchStrategy
      Parameters:
      toSort - list of tours to sort
      repository - tour repository (should be autowired in the client class)
      requesting - administrator that is requesting the ordering
      city - city filter (optional)
      theme - theme filter (optional)
      approxDuration - maximum duration filter (optional)
      tags - tags filter (optional)
      Returns:
      sorted list of tours passed as first parameter
